year.instruction: Find 3 important historical milestones concerning the municipality. Order them consecutively. This is the first one. Enter the year of the first historical milestone

milestone.content: Creation of the District of Dijon with 5 communes

historical_milestones.instruction: Find 3 important historical milestones concerning the inter-municipalities. Make sure they are 3 distinct and different events. Take care of this when researching the individual milestones.
